mtte.availableAssets: Preview matching assets available on Moulinette Cloud
mtte.clearFavoritesContent: Are you sure you want to empty this list? Items in other lists (tabs) will NOT be deleted.
mtte.clipboardImageSuccess: Image path successfully copied into clipboard!
mtte.clipboardImageToolTip: Copy path into clipboard. You can then reuse elsewhere.
mtte.configShowVideoThumbHint: Tries to load a thumbnail for each video by looking for a matchin `webp` image. You may want to disable this feature if you don't have those images because it would result in a lot of errors in the console (fail to download).
mtte.createSceneToolTip: Click to create a scene from the image
mtte.createTileToolTip: Generates a tile and adds it to the current scene
mtte.customReferencesPacks: Packs available on Internet (you can download)
mtte.customReferencesToolTip: Moulinette provides a list of references (ex: free tokens available to download).
mtte.deleteGroupContent: Please confirm that you really want to delete group '{group}'!
mtte.dragTile: Drag tile and drop it on your scene
mtte.dropasActorDescription: You are about to create a token from the dragged image. Choose the options below and confirm.
mtte.dropmodeToolTip: Choose what kind of asset will be generated
mtte.errorCreateTile: In order to create a tile, drag the image and drop it on the scene!
mtte.errorDownload: Image couldn't be downloaded from website. Try again later!
mtte.errorGroupIdInvalid: Group ID may only contain alphanumeric characters (min/max 3/10 chars)!
mtte.errorGroupMaximum: You reached the maximum number of groups!
mtte.errorIconInvalid: Invalid icon! Consider using the picker
mtte.favoriteSettingsDescription: Add/remove groups of favorites. Groups are sorted by ID (history always first)
mtte.forgingFailure: Something went bad. Report it to Moulinette Discord
mtte.groupMacroHint: Macros that will be executed for this group IN ADDITION to the current ones
mtte.groupTileSizeHint: Apply the specified tile size for this group. Leave blank to use the current tile size (Tiles)
mtte.howtoToolTip: Howto: how does it work? How to install new images/tiles.
mtte.indexImagesToolTip: Moulinette will scan the custom folder and index all found images. You must re-index everytime the folder changes.
mtte.indexingInProgress: Moulinette is indexing your assets... please wait
mtte.prefabsDescription: Prefabs (requires Token Attacher module). Assets available on Moulinette Cloud only.
mtte.runMacroToolTip: Executes macros (by name, comma-separated) after creating the tile/article/token. Macros can use 'game.moulinette.param' to access created asset.
mtte.showCase: This pack is a showcase for quickly and easily experimenting the "Tiles" module. To download more packs, visit . Read the documentation on how to bring and manage your assets.
mtte.showCaseAssets: There are {count} assets matching your criteria on Moulinette Cloud. Click to preview them.
mtte.tilesDescription: Search provided by Moulinette. Check available packs for copyrights.
